item.description:
This folder tests a commonly used workflow of creating new accounts and transferring funds between the two.

Because we expect all requests to succeed in this workflow, we have a **status check test** in the **folder-level Scripts tab**.

exec: //all requests in this folder should be valid

item.description: Note that because we are expecting one of the requests in this folder to be invalid, we are moving the status check from the folder level (as we did in the previous folder) to the request level.
